question: Kaziranga National Park and Tiger Reserve (KNPTR) is located in which state?
explanation:
Kaziranga National Park and Tiger Reserve (KNPTR) is located in the state of Assam. Assam is witnessing heavy floods, which has affected around 40 lakh people.
The Tiger reserve, which is also a UNESO World Heritage site, remains submerged in water, due to the heavy floods. As many as 86 animals have died, including rhinoceros, deer and wild boar. This yearâ€™s flood is said to be the sixth worst flood since 1988.
